error_case.name: name_mismatch
error_case.symptom: Frontmatter name does not match directory name

response.step: Do not proceed with additional edits until the mismatch is resolved
Prefer renaming the directory to match the intended canonical name (or update frontmatter), but confirm with the user if the skill is already in use

error_case.name: invalid_name_format
error_case.symptom: Name contains uppercase, underscores, or consecutive hyphens

response.step: Propose a corrected name and confirm before applying renames
Explain that renames may be breaking if other tooling references the skill name
